title: The Unexpectedly Exciting Array of Commuting, Cargo, and Urban Bikes at Velofollies
content:
Eurobike can wait. Velofollies lives up to the rumors of being the best kept secret in bike shows. Check out the best in cargo bikes and urban gear.

Read the full article at The Unexpectedly Exciting Array of Commuting, Cargo, and Urban Bikes at Velofollies on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
